#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
inline int inp()
    {
    int noRead=0;
    char p=getchar_unlocked();
    for(;p<33;){p=getchar_unlocked();};
    while(p>32)
    {
    noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
    p=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return noRead;
    };
int main()
{
    long long n,t,i,k,result;
    t=inp();
    while(t--)
    {
        result=0;
        n=inp();
        k=inp();
        long long num[n];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            num[i]=inp();
        sort(num,num+n);
        for(i=1;i<=k;i++)
            result+=num[n-i];
        printf("%lld\n",result);
    }
}
